availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Paul J. Rattigan (Marion Co., KY, carpenter)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, master carpenter. Kentucky native. Master carpenter in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District no. 1, p. 544.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Miller's Creek, p. 567B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, , X County, KY, DATE, p. 120, (Accessed via ancestry.com on October 17, 2019).
